Who We Are

An interdisciplinary research group at the University of Copenhagen and Rigshospitalet in Copenhagen, focused on advancing cancer treatment and research by combining cutting-edge machine learning, image analysis, and radiotherapy methods.

Close Collaboration

Benefitting from the close locations of Rigshospitalet and Computer Science at the University of Copenhagen, computer scientist, oncologists, and medical physicists share work spaces ensuring that our research is both innovative and clinically relevant.

Join Us

If you are interested in our work or would like to collaborate with us, please contact us. We are always looking for talented researchers and students to collaborate with and contribute to our mission of advancing cancer treatment.
